FormModule.Name: QASF0353
FormModule.Comment:
*******************************************************************
 
FORMS MODULE NAME
 DEQF0002
 
MODIFIED
 REPOS_OWNER 10/11/98 09:20 Created by Oracle Forms
 Generator for
 Oracle Forms Version 4.5.10.0.0
 
Repository APPLICATION SYSTEM
 EDI Version 1
 
PURPOSE
 .
 
TABLE USAGES
 BASE VAN_EDI_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_TYPES SEL INS UPD DEL 
 
REFERENTIAL INTEGRITY RULES
Block VEAT
 Deletion of VAN_EDI_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_TYPES prevented if
 VAN_EDI_ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS records exist
 Foreign key(s): VEAC_VEAT_FK
 Updating of VAN_EDI_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_TYPES prevented if
 VAN_EDI_ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS records exist
 Foreign key(s): VEAC_VEAT_FK
 
*******************************************************************
WHO WHEN WHAT
CAG 02/03/2006 INITIAL VERSION.
CAG 03/07/2006 CAN'T ALLOCATE CRA AND NSS TO SAME AA. 
CAG 21/08/2006 Allow International centres to be manually input. 
CAG 02/01/2007 RfC 06-0233 CRA Centre Self Assessment.
CAG 28/09/2007 LQ34174 - 2007/8 changes.
CAG 25/02/2009 Allow updates to CCEN_INCOMPLETE_IND for certain users.
CAG 04/09/2009 Role 217 for trial centres (2009/10).
CAG 10/06/2010 QCF BTEC23 - running/not running - CRA to QRD (more changes to follow, e.g. the report)
CAG 05/01/2011 New statuses
CAG 30/09/2011 WI518 - QRD Consortia.
CAG 28/10/2011 EC1066 - CCAA_NOTES.
CAG 16/11/2011 Default report type as it is mandatory.
CAG 31/08/2016 EC2133 - more years.
CAG 19/05/2015 EC2506 - QMR 2017 visit or postal etc...
CTS 11/02/2026 EC - Added other academic years to the NBT_YEAR drop down list

Alert.Name: CENTRE_ALL_ALERT
Alert.AlertMessage: Do You Want To List All Centres ?

Alert.Name: CENTRE_UNALLOCATED_ALERT
Alert.AlertMessage: Do You Want To List Unallocated Centres ?

Alert.Name: CENTRE_UNREPORTED_ALERT
Alert.AlertMessage: Do You Want To List Centres With No Report Logged ?

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
GO_BLOCK('CCEN');

CLEAR_BLOCK;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NOT NULL
THEN
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
END IF;

GO_BLOCK('CONTROL');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0353','CREATE SAMPLE',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Create The Sample (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0353 - Function = CREATE SAMPLE is required','E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Academic Year Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

 DECLARE
 l_command VARCHAR2(250);
 l_dcl modules.modu_name%type;
 l_dir VARCHAR2(60); 
 l_submit boolean;
 l_success boolean;

 BEGIN
 
 l_dcl := 'QASD0354';
 l_dir := 'QAS_TOP'; 
 
 l_command := '@'||l_dir||':'||l_dcl||' "'||
 TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.NBT_YEAR)||'"';

 pr_pipe( p_command => l_command,
 p_dcl => l_dcl,
 p_success => l_success);
 
 END;

 MSG_ALERT('''Sample Creation'' Has Been Submitted To Run Immediately...Please Check For Successful Completion Later','I',FALSE);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0333','VAT TEAM',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Automatically Allocate AA''s (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0333 - Function = VAT TEAM is required' ,'E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Academic Year Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_MAXIMUM_MILES IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Maximum Distance In Miles Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

 DECLARE
 l_command VARCHAR2(250);
 l_dcl modules.modu_name%type;
 l_dir VARCHAR2(60); 
 l_submit boolean;
 l_success boolean;

 BEGIN
 
 l_dcl := 'QASD0355';
 l_dir := 'QAS_TOP'; 
 
 l_command := '@'||l_dir||':'||l_dcl||' "'||
 TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.NBT_YEAR)||'" "'||
 TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.NBT_MAXIMUM_MILES)||'"';

 pr_pipe( p_command => l_command,
 p_dcl => l_dcl,
 p_success => l_success);
 
 END;

 MSG_ALERT('''Automatic AA Allocation'' Has Been Submitted To Run Immediately...Please Check For Successful Completion Later','I',FALSE);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Academic Year Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

DECLARE P_NUMBER NUMBER;
 C_WHERE VARCHAR2(1000);
 P_UNALLOCATED VARCHAR2(1);
 P_UNREPORTED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN

 P_NUMBER := SHOW_ALERT('CENTRE_ALL_ALERT');
 P_UNALLOCATED := NULL;
 P_UNREPORTED := NULL;

 IF P_NUMBER = ALERT_BUTTON3
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 
 IF P_NUMBER = ALERT_BUTTON1
 THEN 

 C_WHERE := 'CCEN_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR';
 GO_BLOCK('CCEN');
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('CCEN',DEFAULT_WHERE,C_WHERE);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 ELSE 

 P_NUMBER := SHOW_ALERT('CENTRE_UNALLOCATED_ALERT');
 IF P_NUMBER = ALERT_BUTTON1
 THEN P_UNALLOCATED := 'Y';
 C_WHERE := 'CCEN_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR AND CCEN_REPORT_TYPE <> ''S'' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT NULL FROM CRA_CENTRE_AAS'||
 ' WHERE CCAA_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR AND CCAA_CURRENT_IND = ''Y'' AND'||
 ' CCAA_CENTRE_ID = CRA_CENTRES.CCEN_CENTRE_ID ) ';
 END IF; 
 IF P_UNALLOCATED IS NULL
 THEN
 P_NUMBER := SHOW_ALERT('CENTRE_UNREPORTED_ALERT');
 IF P_NUMBER = ALERT_BUTTON1
 THEN P_UNREPORTED := 'Y';
 C_WHERE := 'CCEN_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR AND CCEN_VISIT_DATE IS NULL';
 END IF; 
 IF P_UNREPORTED IS NULL
 THEN
 MSG_ALERT('No Query Criteria Were Selected','E',TRUE);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF P_UNALLOCATED = 'Y' OR P_UNREPORTED = 'Y'
 THEN
 GO_BLOCK('CCEN');
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('CCEN',DEFAULT_WHERE,C_WHERE);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 C_WHERE := 'CCEN_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR';
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('CCEN',DEFAULT_WHERE,C_WHERE);
 END IF;
 
 END IF;
 
 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0333','QS TEAM',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Insert Centres (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0333 - Function = QS TEAM is required' ,'E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Academic Year Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

GO_BLOCK('CCEN');
CREATE_RECORD;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0333','QS TEAM',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Delete Centres (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0333 - Function = QS TEAM is required','E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Academic Year Must Be Selected First','E',TRUE);
END IF;

-- cannot delete if report already submitted for this year

IF :CCEN.CCEN_GRADE IS NOT NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('Centre Cannot Be Deleted From Sample...Report Already Logged','E',TRUE);
END IF;

BEGIN
 
 DELETE FROM CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE CCAA_YEAR = :CCEN.CCEN_YEAR
 AND CCAA_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;

END;

DELETE_RECORD;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 
 SELECT CN_CENTRE_NAME
 INTO :CCEN.NBT_CENTRE_NAME
 FROM CENTRES
 WHERE CN_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;
-- AND CN_BURE_BUNI_ID+0 > 0;
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN MSG_ALERT('INVALID CENTRE','E',TRUE);
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText: msg_alert('WARNING...this is automatically maintained overnight...your change could be lost !!!','W',FALSE);

Item.Name: NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON
Item.Label: AA Allocation
Item.Tooltip: GREEN : Allocated and Accepted AMBER : Allocated Not Accepted RED : Unallocated GREY : N/A

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CCEN.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE = 'S'
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('SELF ASSESSMENT DOES NOT REQUIRE AN AA ALLOCATED','I',FALSE);
ELSE
 GO_BLOCK('CCAA');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 :CONTROL.NBT_CENTRE_DETAILS1 := :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID||' ('||:CCEN.NBT_CENTRE_NAME||')';
 :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR1 := :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
MSG_ALERT('INFO...NO FURTHER REPORT DETAILS TO DISPLAY','I',FALSE);
--GO_BLOCK('CCEN2');
--EXECUTE_QUERY;
--:CONTROL.NBT_CENTRE_DETAILS2 := :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID||' ('||:CCEN.NBT_CENTRE_NAME||')';

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 
 SELECT CN_CENTRE_NAME
 INTO :CCEN.NBT_CENTRE_NAME
 FROM CENTRES
 WHERE CN_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN :CCEN.NBT_CENTRE_NAME := '?????????????????????????????';
 
END;

BEGIN
 
 SELECT DECODE(CONS_TYPE,'QRD1','Single Report Single AA',
 'QRD2','Multi Report Single AA','?????????')
 INTO :CCEN.NBT_CONS_TYPE
 FROM CONSORTIA
 WHERE CONS_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CONSORTIA_ID;
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 
END;

IF :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR > 2009
THEN :CCEN.NBT_ROLE := 589;
ELSE :CCEN.NBT_ROLE := 216;

 BEGIN
 
 SELECT 217
 INTO :CCEN.NBT_ROLE
 FROM QAS_CENTRES
 WHERE QCEN_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID
 AND QCEN_TRIAL_YEAR IN (8,9);
 
 EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 
 END;

END IF;

IF :CCEN.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE = 'S'
THEN

 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_GREY');

ELSE

 DECLARE P_DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);

 BEGIN
 
 
 SELECT CCAA_ACCEPTED_IND
 INTO P_DUMMY
 FROM CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE CCAA_YEAR = :CCEN.CCEN_YEAR
 AND CCAA_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID
 AND CCAA_CURRENT_IND = 'Y';
 
 IF P_DUMMY = 'Y'
 THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_GREEN');
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_AMBER');
 END IF;

 EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_RED');
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_ALLOCATION_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_RED');
 
 END;
 
END IF;

IF :CCEN.CCEN_VISIT_DATE IS NOT NULL
THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_REPORT_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_GREEN');
ELSE
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('CCEN.NBT_REPORT_BUTTON',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$PUSH_BUTTON_RED');
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:CCEN.CCEN_UPDATE_USER := USER;
:CCEN.CCEN_UPDATE_DATE := TRUNC(SYSDATE);

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0333','QS TEAM',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Insert Centres (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0333 - Function = QS TEAM is required','E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

DECLARE P_DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN

 SELECT 'X'
 INTO P_DUMMY
 FROM DUAL
 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM CRA_CENTRES
 WHERE CCEN_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID 
 AND CCEN_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR );
 
 MSG_ALERT('DUPLICATE CENTRE','E',TRUE);
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 
END;
--:CCEN.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE := 'B';
IF :CCEN.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('REPORT TYPE IS MANDATORY','E',TRUE);
END IF;

--IF :CCEN.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE = 'S'
--THEN
-- MSG_ALERT('SELF ASSESSMENT CENTRES ARE LOADED VIA A SPREADSHEET','E',TRUE);
--END IF;

:CCEN.CCEN_YEAR := :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR;
:CCEN.CCEN_INSERT_USER := USER;
:CCEN.CCEN_INSERT_DATE := TRUNC(SYSDATE);

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText: MSG_ALERT('PLEASE USE THE DELETE BUTTON','I',FALSE);

Trigger.Name: ON-LOCK
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0353','REPORT RESET',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 LOCK_RECORD;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Reset A Report (controlled via CCOF0014). '||
 'Module = QASF0353 - Function = REPORT RESET is required','E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

--IF :CCEN.CCEN_GRADE IS NOT NULL
--THEN
--
-- MSG_ALERT('ERROR...report has already been submitted...report type cannot be amended','E',TRUE);
--
--ELSE
-- 
-- LOCK_RECORD;
-- 
--END IF;

Block.Name: CCAA
Block.OrderByClause: ORDER BY CCAA_CURRENT_IND DESC, CCAA_INSERT_DATE DESC

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 
 SELECT NPP_NAME
 INTO :CCAA.NBT_NPP_NAME
 FROM NPPS
 WHERE NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID
 AND EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM NPP_ROLES
 WHERE NROL_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS = 'CU'
 AND NROL_NPP_ID = NPP_ID
 AND NROL_NRTY_ID+0 = NVL(:CCEN.NBT_ROLE,589)
 AND NVL(NROL_MAX_CENTRES,0) > 0 );
 
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...NOT AN AA WITH QRD ROLE '||TO_CHAR(:CCEN.NBT_ROLE)||
 ' CURRENT AND MAXIMUM CENTRES GREATER THAN ZERO','E',TRUE);
 
END;

DECLARE P_DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);

BEGIN
 
 SELECT NULL
 INTO P_DUMMY
 FROM DUAL
 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM EV_ALLOCATIONS,
 VERIFICATION_SCHEDULE_RECORDS
 WHERE EVAL_VSRE_ID = VSRE_ID+0
 AND EVAL_CURRENT_IND = 'Y'
 AND EVAL_NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID
 AND VSRE_ACADEMIC_YEAR = :CCEN.CCEN_YEAR
 AND VSRE_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID
 AND VSRE_VSME_CODE = 'NSS'
 AND VSRE_NOT_RUNNING_IND IS NULL ); 
 
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...CANNOT ALLOCATE CRA AND NSS TO SAME AA AT A CENTRE','E',TRUE);

EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 
END;

DECLARE P_DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 SELECT NULL
 INTO P_DUMMY
 FROM DUAL
 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM NPP_ROLE_TRAINING,
 NPP_ROLES
 WHERE NRTR_NROL_ID = NROL_ID+0
 AND NRTR_YES_NO = 'Y'
 AND NRTR_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-12)
 AND NROL_NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID
 AND NROL_NRTY_ID+0 = NVL(:CCEN.NBT_ROLE,589)
 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM NPP_ROLE_CENTRE_EXCLUSIONS
 WHERE NRCE_NROL_ID = NROL_ID
 AND SUBSTR(NRCE_CENTRE_ID,1,5) = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID ) ); 
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...TRAINING HAS NOT TAKEN PLACE IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS AND/OR A CENTRE EXCLUSION APPLIES','E',TRUE);
 
END;

DECLARE P_CURRENT_CENTRES NUMBER(3);
 P_MAX_CENTRES NUMBER(3);
 
BEGIN
 
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO P_CURRENT_CENTRES
 FROM QAS_CENTRES,
 CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE QCEN_CENTRE_ID = CCAA_CENTRE_ID||''
 AND ((:CCEN.NBT_ROLE = 216
 AND NVL(QCEN_TRIAL_YEAR,0) = 0) 
 OR (:CCEN.NBT_ROLE = 589
 AND NVL(QCEN_TRIAL_YEAR,0) = 0) 
 OR (:CCEN.NBT_ROLE = 217
 AND NVL(QCEN_TRIAL_YEAR,0) IN (8,9))) 
 AND CCAA_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR
 AND CCAA_CURRENT_IND = 'Y'
 AND CCAA_NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID;

 SELECT NVL(NROL_MAX_CENTRES,0)
 INTO P_MAX_CENTRES
 FROM NPP_ROLES
 WHERE NROL_NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID
 AND NROL_NRTY_ID+0 = NVL(:CCEN.NBT_ROLE,589);
 
 IF P_MAX_CENTRES > P_CURRENT_CENTRES
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...MAXIMUM CENTRES '||TO_CHAR(P_MAX_CENTRES)||' ALREADY ALLOCATED '||TO_CHAR(P_CURRENT_CENTRES),'E',TRUE);
 END IF;
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CCAA.CCAA_CURRENT_IND NOT IN ('Y','N')
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('MUST BE ''Y'' OR ''N''','E',TRUE);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CCAA.CCAA_ACCEPTED_IND NOT IN ('Y','N') AND :CCAA.CCAA_ACCEPTED_IND IS NOT NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('MUST BE ''Y'' OR ''N''','E',TRUE);
END IF;

IF :CCAA.CCAA_ACCEPTED_IND = 'N'
THEN
 :CCAA.CCAA_CURRENT_IND := 'N';
END IF;

IF :CCAA.CCAA_ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' AND :CCAA.CCAA_CURRENT_IND = 'N'
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...CANNOT ACCEPT AN ALLOCATION THAT IS NOT CURRENT','E',TRUE);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:CCAA.CCAA_UPDATE_USER := USER;
:CCAA.CCAA_UPDATE_DATE := TRUNC(SYSDATE);

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE P_ALLOWED VARCHAR2(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 P_ALLOWED := PK_CCO.FN_ACTION_ALLOWED('QASF0333','VAT TEAM',USER);

 IF P_ALLOWED = 'Y'
 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MSG_ALERT('You Do Not Have Sufficient Authority To '||
 'Insert AA Allocations (controlled via CCOF0014) '||
 'Module = QASF0333 - Function = VAT TEAM is required' ,'E',TRUE);
 END IF;

END;

DECLARE P_DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN

 SELECT 'X'
 INTO P_DUMMY
 FROM DUAL
 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT NULL
 FROM CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE CCAA_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID 
 AND CCAA_YEAR = :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR
 AND CCAA_NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID );
 
 MSG_ALERT('DUPLICATE AA ALLOCATION','E',TRUE);
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 
END;

IF :CCAA.CCAA_CURRENT_IND IS NULL
THEN
 MSG_ALERT('CURRENT INDICATOR IS MANDATORY','E',TRUE);
END IF;

:CCAA.CCAA_YEAR := :CONTROL.NBT_YEAR;
:CCAA.CCAA_CENTRE_ID := :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;
:CCAA.CCAA_INSERT_USER := USER;
:CCAA.CCAA_INSERT_DATE := TRUNC(SYSDATE);

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN

 SELECT NPP_NAME
 INTO :CCAA.NBT_NPP_NAME
 FROM NPPS
 WHERE NPP_ID = :CCAA.CCAA_NPP_ID;
 
EXCEPTION
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN :CCAA.NBT_NPP_NAME := '??????????';
 
END;

Item.Name: NBT_NPP
Item.Tooltip: AA Name or for Self Assessment Total Weighted Score if Available A=0-5 B=6-12 C=13-19 D=20-25 E=26-31

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_YEAR = 2006
THEN
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE = 'S'
THEN
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := TO_CHAR(:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL)||' = '||:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_COMMENTS;
 :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := TO_CHAR(:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL)||' = '||:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_COMMENTS;
 :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := TO_CHAR(:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL)||' = '||:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_COMMENTS;
 END IF;
ELSE 
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 1
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'EXCELLENT';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 2
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'GOOD';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 3
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'MODERATE';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 4
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'LIMITED';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 5
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'UNSATISFACTORY';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 1
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'EXCELLENT';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 2
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'GOOD';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 3
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'MODERATE';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 4
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'LIMITED';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 5
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'UNSATISFACTORY';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 1
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'EXCELLENT';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 2
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'GOOD';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 3
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'MODERATE';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 4
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'LIMITED';
END IF;
IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 5
THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'UNSATISFACTORY';
END IF;
END IF;
ELSE
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 1
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'YES';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 3
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'PARTIALLY';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL = 5
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK3 := 'NO';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 1
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'YES';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 3
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'PARTIALLY';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL = 5
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK2 := 'NO';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 1
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'YES';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 3
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'PARTIALLY';
 END IF;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL = 5
 THEN :CCEN2.NBT_RISK1 := 'NO';
 END IF;
END IF;

IF :CCEN2.CCEN_REPORT_TYPE = 'S'
THEN
-- :CCEN2.NBT_NPP := :CCEN2.CCEN_SA_COMPLETER_NAME||'/'||:CCEN2.CCEN_SA_COMPLETER_POSITION;
 IF :CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL IS NOT NULL AND :CCEN2.CCEN_YEAR = 2006
 THEN
 :CCEN2.NBT_NPP := 'Self Ass. Score '||
 TO_CHAR(:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK3_OVERALL*3+:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK2_OVERALL*2+:CCEN2.CCEN_RISK1_OVERALL);
 ELSE
 :CCEN2.NBT_NPP := 'Self Assessment';
 END IF;
ELSE
 BEGIN
 
 SELECT NPP_NAME,
 NPP_ID
 INTO :CCEN2.NBT_NPP,
 :CCEN2.NBT_NPP_ID
 FROM NPPS,
 CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE NPP_ID = CCAA_NPP_ID+0
 AND CCAA_CURRENT_IND = 'Y'
 AND CCAA_YEAR = :CCEN2.CCEN_YEAR
 AND CCAA_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN2.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 END;
END IF;

ProgramUnit.Name: PR_POPULATE_LISTS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PR_POPULATE_LISTS IS

 ERRCODE NUMBER;

BEGIN
 
-- errcode := populate_group('QUALTYPE_RG'); 
-- POPULATE_LIST('QSAM.QSAM_QUAL_TYPE','QUALTYPE_RG');
 null;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PR_VALIDATE_CCAA
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PR_VALIDATE_CCAA IS
 P_TOTAL_COUNT NUMBER(2);
 P_TOTAL_CURRENT NUMBER(2);
BEGIN

 SELECT COUNT(*),
 SUM(DECODE(CCAA_CURRENT_IND,'Y',1,0))
 INTO P_TOTAL_COUNT,
 P_TOTAL_CURRENT
 FROM CRA_CENTRE_AAS
 WHERE CCAA_YEAR = :CCEN.CCEN_YEAR
 AND CCAA_CENTRE_ID = :CCEN.CCEN_CENTRE_ID;

 IF P_TOTAL_COUNT > 0 AND
 P_TOTAL_CURRENT > 1
 THEN

 GO_BLOCK('CCAA');
 MSG_ALERT('ERROR...THERE IS MORE THAN 1 CURRENT AA ALLOCATION','E',TRUE);

 END IF;

 IF P_TOTAL_COUNT > 0 AND
 P_TOTAL_CURRENT = 0
 THEN

 MSG_ALERT('WARNING...THERE IS NO CURRENT ALLOCATION','W',FALSE);

 END IF;

END;

RecordGroup.Name: CRA_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select npp_id, npp_name 
from npps 
where npp_id in ( select nrol_npp_id 
 from npp_roles 
 where nrol_employment_status = 'CU' 
 and nvl(nrol_max_centres,0) > 0
 and nrol_nrty_id = :CCEN.NBT_ROLE )
order by npp_surname, npp_initials, npp_id

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- display a message to indicate the records have been saved

-- force status to be set

 next_field;
 previous_field;
 
IF :System.Form_Status = 'CHANGED' THEN 
 Commit_Form; 
-- the NPP system requires an alert box for commit messages - don't know why!
 if get_application_property(current_form_name) LIKE 'NPP%' then
 msg_alert('Your changes have been written to the database.','I',false);
 else
 commit_message;
 end if;
else
-- the NPP system requires an alert box for commit messages - don't know why!
 if get_application_property(current_form_name) LIKE 'NPP%' then
 msg_alert('No changes to write to the database','I',false);
 else
 message('No changes to write to the database');
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-CLOSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- this trigger will close the window if it is 
-- the primary window
if :system.event_window = 'WINDOW0' then
 exit_form;
end if;

if :system.event_window = 'CCAA_WINDOW' then
 IF :SYSTEM.BLOCK_STATUS = 'CHANGED'
 THEN
 MSG_ALERT('PLEASE SAVE (OR CLEAR) ANY CHANGES BEFORE CLOSING THIS WINDOW','E',TRUE);
 ELSE
 PR_VALIDATE_CCAA;
 GO_BLOCK('CCEN');
 END IF;
end if;


if :system.event_window = 'CCEN_WINDOW' then
 GO_BLOCK('CCEN');
end if;

if :system.event_window = 'CCAA_WINDOW2' then
 GO_BLOCK('CCAA');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- call procedure to set form titles
 WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE;

 pr_populate_lists;
